item.title: Season Dates
item.description: <hr> We are pleased to announce the tentative dates for the WRCCDC 2021-2022 season! We wanted to announce these dates early to make sure people had enough time to plan.

item.title: Regional Finalists
item.description: WRCCDC is proud to announce the winners of the WRCCDC Qualifiers 2021! The following 8 teams will move onto the regional. The teams are listed in ranking, based on their total team score.

item.title: Registered Teams
item.description: We are pleased to announce the teams that are registered for the WRCCDC 2021 Qualifier. We have 18 teams registered this year. See you at the online round!

item.title: November Training Session 1
item.description: The Staff of the Western Regional Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition is happy to welcome Bluespawn as our training presenter during out 1st Fall Training Session.

item.title: November Invitational Registration
item.description: <hr> Please use the form below to sign up for the Virtual Fall Invitational coming up in November. If the form does not appear, please click on the link below.

item.description: <hr> Congratulations to the teams that made it to the 2020 Regionals!

item.title: Become a Sponsor
item.description: <hr> In order to promote the competition's success, we need a strong foundation. Sponsorship allows us to maintain the high quality associated with this program. Sponsorship also defrays institution costs, increases participation, and the number of students entering the workforce with this invaluable experience.

item.description: <hr> If you would like to help out and volunteer with WRCCDC, please fill out one of the forms below.

item.title: Season Participants
item.description: <hr> Good luck to all the teams involved in the 2020 WRCCDC Season!

item.title: Acknowledgements
item.description: <hr> WRCCDC is brought to you by volunteers, who put in countless hours of work every week. Without their help, this competition would not be possible. We would like to take the opportunity to thank everyone for their hard work and contribution.

item.title: Competition Format
item.description: <hr> Since the Western Regional of CCDC covers a large region of schools, we host multiple, invitationals each year to give many schools the opportunity to participate in the competition.

item.title: Competitor Calls
item.description: These are the tentative dates for the competitor calls. The schedule may be subject to change.

item.title: Season Dates
item.description: <hr> We are pleased to announce the dates for the WRCCDC 2020 season! We wanted to announce these dates early to make sure people had enough time to plan.

item.title: Competition Rules
item.description: The following are the approved national rules for the 2019-2020 CCDC season. Please refer to the official rules for your specific CCDC event for any local variations. WRCCDC largely follows National CCDC rules, however there are minor differences between this and other regions. Contact organizers@wrccdc.org if you have questions.

item.title: Mission
item.description: <hr> The mission of the Collegiate Cyber Defense Competition (CCDC) system is to provide institutions with an information assurance or computer security curriculum a controlled, competitive environment to assess their student's depth of understanding and operational competency in managing the challenges inherent in protecting a corporate network infrastructure and business information systems.

item.title: History
item.description: <hr> On February 27 & 28, 2004, a group of educators, students, government and industry representatives gathered in San Antonio, Texas, to discuss the feasibility and desirability of establishing regular cyber security exercises with a uniform structure for post-secondary level students.

item.title: Contact
item.description: If you need to contact us by email, feel free to use the form below. We are also available on Twitter, Discord, & Facebook. Your Name Email Address An email address is required. Message

item.title: Sponsors
item.description: We would like to take the time to thank all of our sponsors for their support. Without their contributions, this competition would not be possible. If you are interested in sponsoring us for next year, our call for Sponsors for the 2020 season is now open! Please see our Sponsorship Information Page for more information. Platinum Gold Silver
